casebody.data:
Adela Reivitz, appellee, v. Chicago Rapid Transit Company, appellant.Gen. No. 30,781.

Thomson, J., dissents.

Opinion filed October 13, 1926.Gardner, Foote, Burns & Morrow, for appellant; Walter M. Fowler and James K. Miller, of counsel. Ryan & Rosenthal, for appellee; Philip Rosenthal, of counsel. Mr, Presiding Justice Taylor

delivered the opinion of the court.
